title: Gifting Me To His Best Friend
description: This Christmas, my husband is going with an unconventional gift for his best friend.Me.It’s only supposed to be for one night… But one night becomes two, becomes our entire vacation. There are no rules except the ones we make, and sharing me brings both Derek and Grayson closer than any of us could have imagined.This year, what happens in our bedroom will put all three of us on Santa’s Naughty List.*Sword-cross guarantee*
author: Katee Robert
